articles.author: Nick Flaherty
articles.title: First showing of Monaco lunar rover ... - eeNews Europe
articles.description: Venturi Astrolab has shown its FLEX (Flexible Logistics and Exploration) lunar rover for the first time at its labs in Monaco.
articles.content:
Venturi Astrolab has shown its FLEX (Flexible Logistics and Exploration) lunar rover for the first time at its labs in Monaco.
